Adam Buckingham (born 29 July 1988) is a British acrobatic gymnast who won the title of world men's fours champion with Adam McAssey, Alex Uttley and Jonathan Stranks in July 2010 in Poland.
McAssey was a member of Spelbound, the gymnastic group who rose to fame in 2010, winning the fourth series of ''Britain's Got Talent''. The prize was Â£100,000 and the opportunity to appear at the 2010 Royal Variety Performance.
